brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts the DNS message format.
DNS uses the same message format for:
- All types of client queries and server responses.
- Error messages.
- Transferring resource record information between servers.

DNS Message Components:
- Header
- Question (The question for the name server)
- Answer (Resource records answering the question)
- Authority (Resource records pointing toward an authority)
- Additional (Resource records holding additional information)
